They explain the importance of equalizing the magnetic force in a patient and activating the spine. Additionally, the author discusses the closure of the senses technique and the ten plexuses technique, which can help create a magnetic state more quickly. The author also explains how to perform the hypnodrama technique and discusses the sway test, which can help stimulate unconscious answers. Understanding these techniques can help therapists better communicate with their clients and achieve better therapeutic results.

last_phrase: In conclusion, these four days of training have covered a wide range of techniques and exercises for therapists to use in their practice. From increasing archetypes to incorporating sounds and metacommunicational code, from using magnetic passes to induce deep somnambulism, to exercises for weight loss and fast release technique, the techniques and methods presented here are practical and varied. Each technique is designed to help the therapist better understand their clients and help them achieve their goals. With practice, therapists can improve their skills and better serve their clients in their healing journey.
